A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was a mess. Sure there were ok moments\, but for those of us who are true Star Wars fans\, this film was utterly disrespectful to not only the originals and prequels\, but also the work J.J. did on “The Force Awakens”. Sure you can do something original\, but the foundation has already been laid and it’s your job to build upon what is already there. “The Last Jedi” was a waste of a movie and ensured that the following movie\, episode IX\, will have to make leaps and bounds to correct the damage that has been done to Star Wars.
